bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I love to buzz around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🐝 I make a buzzing sound.
🌻 I like to visit colorful plants.
🍯 I help make honey!

bug.question: I am green and jump very high. I like to eat plants. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I eat leaves.
🐸 Some animals like to eat me.
💚 I am the color of grass.

bug.question: I have many legs and crawl on the ground. People think I'm creepy. What am I?

hints.text: 🕷️ I can have lots of eyes.
🕸️ I might spin a web.
🏡 I live outside and sometimes inside.

bug.question: I am red with black spots. People say I bring good luck. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am small and round.
🍎 I am the color of some apples.
⚫ My spots are black.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar and then go into a chrysalis before I become something beautiful that flies. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I love to eat leaves when I'm young
🌈 I have pretty colorful wings
🦋 I fly around in the sunshine

bug.question: I march in a line and carry food back to my home. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small.
💪 I can carry things much bigger than myself.
🏠 I live in a colony.

bug.question: I twinkle at night and light up the dark. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 I have a light on my tail.
🌌 You can see me in the summer evenings.
✨ I am a type of beetle.

bug.question: I sing loudly in the summer, but I spend most of my life underground. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 Only the males sing!
🌳 I live in trees.
⏳ I can live for many years as a nymph.

bug.question: I can walk on water. What am I?

hints.text: 💦 I am very light.
⛸️ I have long legs that help me 'skate'.
🏞️ I live near ponds and streams.

bug.question: I make a sticky substance that is also sweet and yummy, and ants love me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I live on plants.
🍯 Ants farm me for my honeydew.
🌱 I am a type of sap sucking bug, a cousin to cicadas

transport.question: I have wheels and go on the road. People ride in me to go places. What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 Many families own one of me.
👪 I can carry more than one person.
🚦 I stop at red lights.

transport.question: I float on the water and take people on trips. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am bigger than a bathtub.
⚓️ I need an anchor to stay still.
🌬️ Sometimes I have a sail.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 👧 You might need training wheels when you're learning.
🚧 You can ride me on a sidewalk.
🔔 I often have a bell to ring.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people to faraway places. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am bigger than a bird.
✈️ I go to the airport.
🌎 I can fly all over the world.

transport.question: I am long and travel on tracks, carrying lots of people. What am I?

hints.text: 🚝 I make a 'choo-choo' sound.
🛤️ I follow a set path on rails.
🧑‍🤝‍🧑 Many people can ride inside me at once.

transport.question: I'm a car that helps people when they are hurt. I have a siren. What am I?

hints.text: 🚨 I have flashing lights.
🏥 I take people to the hospital.
🚑 People call me in an emergency.

transport.question: I am a big vehicle that takes many children to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🛑 I am often yellow.
🎒 I have a stop sign that comes out.
👧👦 I carry lots of students.

transport.question: I can fly straight up and down, and I have spinning blades on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I don't need a runway to take off.
🚨 Sometimes I am used for rescues.
🔄 My blades spin very fast.

transport.question: I'm a special kind of car that helps put out fires. I have a hose and a ladder. What am I?

hints.text: 🚒 I am usually red.
🚨 I have a loud siren and flashing lights.
🔥 I spray water to stop fires.

transport.question: I travel far, far away from Earth, and explore space. What am I?

hints.text: 👩‍🚀 Astronauts travel in me.
🚀 I need a lot of power to launch.
🌌 I go to the moon and beyond.
